definition: poor evaluation/adverse criticism
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
to send/to commission/messenger/mission
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: But there is nothing stopping buyer A from falsely or punitively rating seller B poorly.
sentences.chinese: 但是有可能，A因失误或过于苛刻而给B一个差评。

sentences.english: If you do not return to the bad comments buyer insists on appeal can I do?
sentences.chinese: 如果不退货买家执意给差评我可以申诉吗？

sentences.english: The actor felt that the bad review of his performance was not just.
sentences.chinese: 这位演员觉得人们对他表演的差评是不公平的。

sentences.english: On my second visit it was with a bunch of friends for dessert.
sentences.chinese: 这应该是我进入口碑网来第一次给一家店的“差评”。

sentences.english: That was because Google’s algorithm, he claimed, was unable to distinguish between praise and complaints.
sentences.chinese: 他强调，谷歌搜索功能根本无法区分好评和差评。

definition: favorable criticism/positive evaluation
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
negative score/minus (in grades, such as A-)
(slang) to roast/to ridicule/also pr. [tu3 cao2]
seller
proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
low marks/low score
customer service
to return a product for another item
(Internet slang) to shift the blame/to pass the buck
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to generate fake transactions in order to game a commercial online platform (one that rewards users who make numerous transactions)
to grade/to mark (student's work)/grade/score (of student's work)
to use an image without permission
Douban, PRC social networking website
cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])
